EmailAccountType.title: Account Type
EmailAccountType.description: The protocol for accessing the account

EmailAccountDescription.title: Account Description
EmailAccountDescription.description: The display name of the account (e.g. "Company Mail Account")

IncomingMailServerIMAPPathPrefix.title: Incoming Mail Server IMAP Path Prefix
IncomingMailServerIMAPPathPrefix.description: The path prefix for the IMAP mail server.

EmailAccountName.title: User Display Name
EmailAccountName.description: The display name of the user (e.g. "John Appleseed")

IdentificationUUID.title: IdentificationUUID
IdentificationUUID.description: The UUID of the Identification Payload to use as the source for the user email and username values.

PreventMove.title: Allow user to move messages from this account
PreventMove.description: Messages can be moved out of this account into another.

disableMailRecentsSyncing.title: Allow recent addresses to be synced
disableMailRecentsSyncing.description: Include this account in recent address syncing

allowMailDrop.title: Allow Mail Drop
allowMailDrop.description: Allow Mail Drop for this account

PreventAppSheet.title: Use Only In Mail
PreventAppSheet.description: Send outgoing mail from this account only from Mail app

SMIMEEnabled.title: S/MIME Enabled
SMIMEEnabled.description: If set to true, this account will support S/MIME

SMIMESigningEnabled.title: Enable S/MIME Signing
SMIMESigningEnabled.description: Support S/MIME signing for this account

SMIMESigningCertificateUUID.title: S/MIME Signing Certificate
SMIMESigningCertificateUUID.description: The PayloadUUID of the identity certificate used to sign messages sent from this account.

SMIMEEncryptionEnabled.title: Enable S/MIME Encryption
SMIMEEncryptionEnabled.description: Support S/MIME encryption from this account

SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUID.title: S/MIME Encryption Certificate
SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUID.description: The PayloadUUID of the identity certificate used to decrypt messages coming into this account.

SMIMEEnablePerMessageSwitch.title: Enable per-message encryption switch
SMIMEEnablePerMessageSwitch.description: Allow the user to choose whether to encrypt each message

SMIMESigningUserOverrideable.title: Enable S/MIME toggle
SMIMESigningUserOverrideable.description: Allow the user to toggle S/MIME signing on or off in Settings.

SMIMESigningCertificateUUIDUserOverridea.title: Enable user to select the signing identity
SMIMESigningCertificateUUIDUserOverridea.description: Allow the user to select the signing identity.

SMIMEEncryptByDefault.title: Enable S/MIME by default
SMIMEEncryptByDefault.description: If SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch is false, this default cannot be changed by the user.

SMIMEEncryptByDefaultUserOverrideable.title: Enable user to toggle S/MIME by default
SMIMEEncryptByDefaultUserOverrideable.description: Allow the user to toggle the encryption by default setting.

SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUIDUserOverri.title: Enable user to select the signing identity and encryption is enabled
SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUIDUserOverri.description: Allow the user to select the signing identity and encryption is enabled.

SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch.title: Enable per-message encryption switch
SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch.description: Allow the user toggle encrytion in the compose view and encryption is enabled.

IncomingMailServerHostName.title: Incoming Mail Server Hostname
IncomingMailServerHostName.description: Hostname or IP Address for incoming mail

IncomingMailServerUsername.title: Incoming Mail Server Username
IncomingMailServerUsername.description: The username used to connect to the server for incoming mail

IncomingMailServerAuthentication.title: Incoming Mail Server Authentification Type
IncomingMailServerAuthentication.description: The authentication method for the incoming mail server

IncomingPassword.title: Incoming Mail Server Password
IncomingPassword.description: The password for the incoming mail server

IncomingMailServerUseSSL.title: Incoming Mail Server Use SSL
IncomingMailServerUseSSL.description: Retrieve incoming mail through Secure Socket Layer

OutgoingMailServerHostName.title: Outgoing Mail Server Hostname
OutgoingMailServerHostName.description: Hostname or IP address for outgoing mail

OutgoingMailServerPortNumber.title: Outgoing Mail Server Port
OutgoingMailServerPortNumber.description: The port number for outgoing mail

OutgoingMailServerUsername.title: Outgoing Mail Server Username
OutgoingMailServerUsername.description: The username used to connect to the server for outgoing mail

OutgoingMailServerAuthentication.title: Outgoing Mail Server Authentication Type
OutgoingMailServerAuthentication.description: The authentication method for the outgoing mail server

OutgoingPassword.title: Outgoing Mail Server Password
OutgoingPassword.description: The password for the outgoing mail server

OutgoingPasswordSameAsIncomingPassword.title: Outgoing Password Same As Incoming
OutgoingPasswordSameAsIncomingPassword.description: SMTP authentication uses the same password as POP/IMAP

OutgoingMailServerUseSSL.title: Outgoing Mail Server Use SSL
OutgoingMailServerUseSSL.description: Send outgoing mail through Secure Socket Layer
